name: Wei-Meng Lee
bio:
Wei-Meng Lee is a technologist and founder of Developer Learning Solutions, a technology company specializing in hands-on training on the latest technologies. He is an established developer and trainer specializing in Data Science, Blockchain, and Mobile technologies.

Wei-Meng speaks regularly at international conferences and has authored and co-authored numerous books on topics ranging from blockchain to machine learning. He currently writes a regular column for Towards Data Science and Code Magazine. He is also the author of Beginning Ethereum Smart Contracts Programming and Python Machine Learning.

name: Monica Beate Tvedt
bio:
Monica has more than 20 years of national and international experience working as a Tech leader and software engineer building SaaS, Web and Mobile applications for sectors such as; Telecom, Engineering, Retail and Banking.

Besides her love for Tech and building tech companies, she spends as much time as she can working on gender equality initiatives, organizing Mobile Tech Meetups, Guest Lecturing and teaching new tech to the next generation.

Monica is someone who not only has solid experience from the industry, but also has helped shape it. She has long marked herself as a strong influencer, and has been credited as a role model for women in tech and came on the list of Norwayâ€™s 50 most influential women in tech in 2021.

Monica is also a co-organizer of Apprise conf!
